PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05172020-06-29,  ESDC,  IRCC,  TB,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectFees Paid for the Provision of Services in Relation to an Assessment from the Department of Employment and Social Development Remission Order
PrecisFEES PAID FOR THE PROVISION OF SERVICES IN RELATION TO AN ASSESSMENT FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT REMISSION ORDER in order to reimburse employers who paid for an Labour Market Impact Assessment, and are unable to bring temporary foreign workers to Canada due to the economic impact of COVID-19 or due to government policies designed to contain the COVID-19 pandemic.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2020-0050 Publication Date: 2020-07-22
AttachmentsAttachment
